strings: <Cap><leader> discovers a new recipe for the alchemy pot!
<se_def>*: If you're planning on heading into the snowy country, you should spend the night here and warm your bones first.
<se_def>*: If you go through the cave northwest of here, you'll find yourself in a place with snow as far as the eye can see.
<se_def>*: I'd love to see the snow for myself, but I'm useless in the cold. Just thinking about it makes my teeth ch-chatter!
<se_def>*: I'm waiting around here in this church in the hope that I might eventually pluck up the courage to go and have a look.
